page.title: 02Employment - Newmarket.
page.content: Racing Stables: There are two racing stables in this area and these provide employment for a good many people. Valuable horses have to be well looked after by people who understand them and they must be properly trained to race. "Strings" of horses are often encountered in the early mornings and and traffic is expected to give way to them as they make their way to the Heath. The followers of racing take a great interest in a locally trained horse. Stud Farms: There are three stud farms in this area concerned with the commercial breeding of horses. They always look very well-kept with well maintained fences and trees for shelter and shade.
